laboratory_examinations.findings: Genomic DNA was extracted from peripheral blood using QIAamp DNA Mini Kit and quantified with Nanodrop 2000.
A genomic DNA library was constructed using NEXTflexÂ® Rapid DNA-Seq Kit.
The libraries were captured by xGen Exome Research Panel v2 and sequenced by Novaseq 6000.
Total RNA was extracted from peripheral blood samples using TRIzol Reagent and reverse transcribed to cDNA.
PCR was performed with specific primers designed upstream and downstream of gene c.1373+1G>A variation.
PCR products were separated by 2% agarose gel electrophoresis and sequenced by ABI 3500.
Brain MRI was performed on the patient at age 8 years.
A muscle biopsy was performed on the patient at age 8 years and processed with standard methods for histology and histochemistry.
